name: 45 Degree Back Extension
description: Position yourself face down on the 45 degree hyperextension bench with the pad at your upper thighs and feet secured under the ankle rollers. Cross arms over your chest or behind your head. Lower your torso by hinging at the hips until you feel a stretch in the hamstrings, then extend back up by squeezing the glutes and hamstrings. Avoid hyperextending the lower back at the top.
